member.summary: Contact of the customer.

member.name: M:WinFormsApp1.Classes.Customer.Save
member.summary: Saves the customer to the database. If the customer ID is -1, a new record is created. Otherwise, the existing record is updated.
member.returns: The ID of the saved customer, or -1 if an error occurs.

member.summary: Provides functionality for managing customer data within the tourism management system.

member.returns: A object populated with data from the database.

member.name: M:WinFormsApp1.Classes.CustomerManager.LoadAllCustomers
member.summary: Loads all customers from the database.

member.returns: The total price of the reservation if valid input is provided; otherwise, -1.
